adrFormatAddress: 47 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I had my hair done by Bernice for the first time, and I cannot express how thrilled I am with the results. I went in with a vision of achieving an ashy blond look with dimensional highlights, and Bernice not only understood my vision but brought it to life in the most beautiful way possible. What truly sets Bernice apart is her professionalism and genuine care for her clients. From the moment I walked in, she made me feel comfortable and at ease. Bernice took the time to discuss my requirements in detail, ensuring she had a clear understanding of what I wanted. Throughout the process, she was patient, attentive, and incredibly kind. She took the time to explain each step of the process, providing valuable insights into the techniques she was using and why. This not only showcased her expertise but also made me feel more involved and informed about the transformation happening to my hair. I highly recommend Bernice to anyone looking for a skilled and considerate hairstylist.

originalText.text: I went to Unfade Hair Studio recently. I made my appointment online for hair color, I was a little nervous not knowing who I would get but desperate to get my hair done before the holidays. When I arrived at the salon I was greeted by Charles who helped me with my hair. I wanted my hair lightened with balayage and cut. Charles and his assistant did a great job. I was very satisfied. The staff were all friendly as well. I love the way my hair turned out. I look forward to visiting him again next time! Thank youüòä

originalText.text: I went to Unfade Hair Studio back in July, and I definitely do not regret! I visited Bernice and her assistant and they were phenomenal! I‚Äôm writing this review months later, but my hair has just been growing out so seamlessly and still looks like I recently got it done. If you‚Äôre ever looking to switch up your hair I highly recommend Bernice as she is very attentive and though the process was very long and tedious Bernice and her assistant were very patient and were able to make my hair fabulous!!

originalText.text: Charles did an amazing job to my hair. I was told that the color I initially wanted could not hold because I had dyed my hair too many times in the past. However, Charles really took the time and efforts to make sure that the color came out close to what I desired. The whole process took about 7 hours, but everything paid off in the end when I saw the result. My coworkers and friends like the color and I‚Äôm thrilled with it. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for professional hair coloring service.

originalText.text: so this was the first time that I got my entire head of hair done, and it was such an amazing experience. Charles was my stylist (so nice!) and he legitimately accomplished what other stylists told me would be impossible to do‚Äîalbeit it did take around 7 hours i would definitely do it all over again. everyday i get compliments about my hair! i got my hair done in september so this is a very late review, but definitely would recommend unfade!
